title: Completed PE Summary - Jubilee Quest/Linda Buck
raw_html:
Vessel name Jubilee Quest
Category Fishing
Registered Owner & Manager: DOlbeck Fishing Company Ltd
Port of registry: Grimsby
Flag: UK
Type: UK
Built: 1997
Construction: Steel
Length overall: 21.2
Gross tonnage: 178.00
Date & Time 16/03/04 23:10
Location of incident: English coastal waters
Incident Type: Near miss
Injuries/ fatalities: None
Damage/ Pollution: None

Vessel name Linda Buck
Category Merchant
Registered Owner & Manager: Buck W
Port of registry: Limassol
Flag: Cyprus
Type: Dry Cargo
Built: 1985
Length overall: 95.92
Gross tonnage: 2295.00
Date & Time 16/03/04 23:10
Location of incident: English coastal waters
Incident Type: Near miss
Injuries/ fatalities: None
Damage/ Pollution: None

Synopsis

Near miss between a fishing vessel and a coastal cargo vessel.

Action taken:

The Chief Inspector of Marine Accidents wrote to the cargo vessel's company making comment on the following safety issues:

  • navigation relied solely on the use of the GPS, contrary to IMO resolution A.893 (21)

  • No records of a lookout during the hours of darkness contrary to the requirements of STCW95

  • Use of radar with a GPS speed input producing ground stabilisation, which can be a source of confusion especially from the echo of a slow moving fishing vessel
